channel.title: spirituality on My Journey
channel.description: Recent content in spirituality on My Journey

item.description: Bhagavad Gita # By Vyasa Summary # The Bhagavad Gita is a spiritual book from around 200 BC. It was written by a man named Vyasa. As I looked deeper into this work, I found that I needed the context of where this book came from. This book appears to be a 700 verse excerpt from a larger work called the Mahabharata. This is truly an epic poem and is thousands of pages long.
